review_text: Great place for 2!! Comfy bed, great shower & so much fun staying in a Treehouse! Highly recommend!!

Jodi's place was perfect for our one-night stay in Fort Collins. My husband and I were just passing through town but would have happily stayed for another night or two. I've stayed in many Airbnbs, and this was one of the cleanest. It is also a bit more spacious than pictured. Scenic with the trees, clean, peaceful, and would recommend to others.
My only condolences are no tv and microwave but all in all a very cute clean nice place to stay I definitely enjoyed our stay with jodi
Charming location up among the trees. Very clean throughout. Coffee beans and grinder provided! Flexible on checkout time. Will return when next in Ft Collins.

The treehouse is perfect for a quaint stay. The “kitchen” is minimal so probably not ideal for a long stay, but was perfect for an overnight getaway. The space is adorable and clean, and was easy to find.

In a nutshell: both my husband and I now want a treehouse of our very own. If you have the chance to stay there we highly recommend it. Jodi is excellent when communicating and goes above and beyond as a host.
The treehouse was cozy, clean and quiet! Perfect for a quick stay!

This treehouse is great! Enjoyed the peace and quiet and privacy.
Everything worked inside the apartment.
I will return.
Fantastic place to stay! Super clean, comfortable and pleasant. Will be sure to stay there anytime visiting Fort Collins.
Very friendly host humans, chickens, and dog. Quiet location walkable to CSU and resraurants.
an annual visit to Fort Collins
Great little space in very quiet part of Fort Collins. Perfect for two. Very clean, comfortable bed. Luxurious shower. Jodi was a very responsive host. Would definitely stay here again.

We had a very relaxing time for a nice weekend getaway. Very cozy and peaceful location. Neighborhood was very quite, but very quick to get downtown to all the activity. Would definitely return again!
Had so much fun staying here, cutest spot close to campus.
We enjoyed Jodi’s place so much. Everything was great. It was private and peaceful in a superb location. Highly recommended!

Host was very responsive, friendly and flexible. The treehouse studio was cozy, charming, and private. Great location close to campus. I could not have asked for a better short term accommodation near CSU.

Great place to stay for a visit to CSU! The neighborhood is nice and quiet, while still being very close to campus. As a bonus, there were chickens in the yard when I left for the day! It may be a little cozy for 2 people depending on your preferences, but it was more than enough for a solo trip. I would happily stay here again!
Wonderful cozy treehouse.
Right close to old Fort Collins, lots of bars and restaurants within walking distance. Very friendly and responsive host. The space was clean and homey. Looked exactly like the pictures.
Great spot for little Fort Collins getaway! Close to downtown, quiet, very lovely!
Fun place! Definitely would choose this place again!
Great stay
Great stay, easy, close to restaurants and super clean!
This was the cutes place we have ever stayed at.Great location,peaceful and everything you can ask for.Jodi was amazing!
The treehouse was just what we needed. Close to everything but tucked away out of the busy. Best of both worlds. Jodi was great. Loved the chickens.
An amazing stay!
Perfectly located and walkable for my daughter's CSU graduation! Great safe neighborhood.
Quiet neighbourhood and nice hosts.

An impeccable stay, from beginning to end. Intimate studio, it feels like home. It's quiet but close to downtown so you can even visit on foot. Jodi is really very kind and willing to help. She gave me some good suggestions that allowed me to visit several friendly places. I highly recommend.

This place is even cuter and cozier than the photos, and is in a great location for walking to CSU or Old Town. Jodi was super responsive. It snowed during our stay and she kept the paths and stairs clear and safe for us. A great place to stay that feels like a getaway in the heart of Fort Collins.

This is a wonderful, charming little place that was reasonably close to several places to checkout in town. We really enjoyed the extra privacy on the location and how laid back the neighborhood was. Jodi was a wonderful host and provided us with an excellent stay!
This such a sweet, charming place! just right for a couple looking a cozy place to away the noise but still close Old Town and the campus. Loved it!
Enjoyed my stay. comfortable bed, good shower and close to University.
Very quaint place, great location. Helpful and responsive host. Loved her dog and hearing the chickens in the backyard.
cleanly, well-appointed space in hosts backyard. chickens and sweet pups sometimes in yard. easy check in/out.
We had a wonderful time!

We really enjoyed the quiet tranquility of the tree house. Jodi was very responsive to our needs. It was cuter than it looks in the photos and we especially liked the high quality linens. This was the perfect place to stay while visiting our CSU student and we were able to walk to campus from the tree house.
Basically got what we saw on the listing. Only negative was no closet or hangers for clothing (though a few hooks were available). Really enjoyed the accommodation and would return.
Jodi's place is in a great location. She let us borrow her bikes, so we were able to get around Fort Collin's easily. The room is comfortable and spacious. We look forward to returning another day.

Smooth process all the way around! Room was unlocked and had directions for access upon checkin. Room was incredibly clean and looked even nicer than photos presented. Great lighting, beautiful loft, and very little surrounding noise led to great sleep and a wonderful stay! My first AirBNB experience was memorable and perfect, no complaints at all!
The property is just as described. Very convenient location for visiting CSU and Old town. Cool puppy and chickens (and people).
Jodi is really nice and I appreciate her advices and kidness. Excellent Host.
Great communication
Super friendly and responsive, very easy to find and would stay with again!
A very pleasant place to stay in a leafy neighborhood.

Jodi is a very hospitable host. She is responsive to communications, friendly, and accommodating. The treehouse is well named - it’s a lovely little garage apartment surrounded by trees. It’s in a quiet neighborhood which is also easily walkable to restaurants and groceries. Definitely recommended host and recommended place!

It's impossible to overstate what a delightful stay I had at The Treehouse. The place itself is gorgeous and homey, in a lovely neighborhood close to the CSU campus. It's at the back of the same property as the main house, but feels completely private. Jodi is very thoughtful and personable; we had a very nice conversation one day and she gave me some great recommendations for food and drink. There is a wonderful, low-key entertainment district within walking distance, with a variety of good restaurants, pubs and taprooms, which feels like it's popular with the locals and the students. And the more tourist-y "Old Town" district is a very short drive. More on-topic, the check-in and checkout were very easy and accommodating. There are so many nice touches in the unit; whole bean coffee and a grinder were provided; a tea kettle, full size fridge, so much more. Highly recommend and will definitely stay there if I visit FoCo again! I'd give it more than 5 stars if I could!
Perfect place close to campus.
I really enjoyed the Treehouse and plan to stay there next time I stay overnight in Fort Collins!
Lovely setting. Close to downtown. Friendly host.
Fun loft studio above the garage.

We loved the Treehouse, and we loved Grouse and Natasha! Grouse is such a funny dog. If you're an animal lover and had to leave your pets at home, this a great place to stay. Friendly dogs and chickens in the fenced in yard combined with the secluded deck on the Treehouse makes you feel less like you're in the city and more like you're in a cabin in the country. Jodi is a great host with wonderful recommendations. The place was spotless, directions were easy to follow and checkout was a breeze. The location is just 1/2 mile from the college and Old Town making for an easy walk to many of the restaurants, bars and shopping.
Loved loved this place. So cute, modern and clean. Had everything I needed and Jody was helpful and accommodating. Would definitely recommend and will be returning.
Nice place, very peaceful. No TV. If you aren't comfortable with animals, it is not the place for you. We are, so it was fine. The location in relation to CSU is perfect for a game.
The treehouse was beautiful, modern, super clean and in an excellent location!! This was exactly what we needed for a night in Fort Collins- the perfect stay!!!

The Treehouse was such a nice place to stay while we moved our daughter back to Colorado State University. The location was well within walking distance of the campus and restaurants.
Jodi was super nice and made us feel right at home.
Super clean and cute space!
We loved the Treehouse! Perfect location and close to CSU. Lovely setting and friendly hosts.
We loved our stay at the Treehouse. Jodi helped us feel comfortable and provided good instructions. We would stay here again for sure!
Great stay
Great stay!!
Had a lovely stay. Place was cosy and had everything you could need. Nice and easy walk into the old town with shops, cafes and restaurants nearby.

I loved staying at the treehouse! it was a walking distance from campus, had a toaster oven to cook with and a few different coffee options. I would definitely stay again if I had another trip to fort Collins.

Jodi's place was great for our short stay in Fort Collins. The space itself is small but it was perfect for us and had everything we needed. The location is centrally located and it was easy to get around.
Great spot for a quick trip
Exactly as described. Very peaceful after a long day at a conference. Enjoyed the trees and birdsong. Everything was clean, easy to find, and private.
Great stay and location!
Thanks for hosting! We enjoyed our stay and appreciated the accommodations.
Jodi was very nice and communicative.
Thank you so much for your hospitality, very cozy treehouse! We felt right at home! Definitely would recommend to anyone! & the most Adorable Dog was always there to greet us and get belly rubs!

Jodi's place is clean, modern, and in an ideal location. Even though we were minutes from everything, we felt like we were in a nature retreat with the trees right in front of the windows. Great spot to unwind after a day of adventures.
Jodi's place was awesome and she was an excellent host. It was a very cool place, nice vibe and easy to get downtown to food, music, breweries. Jodi even loaned me a bike! Thanks, Jodi.

We were absolutely in love with this spot! So cosy in the cutest neighbourhood, walkable to Old Town and Jodi provided parking accommodations. The space was incredibly well stocked with anything we might need and styled very tastefully. Would definitely stay here again! Bonus points for the chickens running around!
Beautiful little place to stay — great price and private for renters

This is a unique place to stay and close to CSU and downtown. I love the chickens in her backyard and her two sweet dogs. The only downside is that there is only street parking, but Ft. Collins streets are like wide boulevards, so no real problem.

Super cute place! We just had a quick stay after a nearby wedding, but it was perfect! It was very easy to find and had everything we needed. We loved the tree and that it stayed nice and cool at night with just the windows and fan, we didn’t even need to use the AC unit even though it was a hot day

The treehouse was the perfect spot to stay at in Fort Collins! The space was very cute and comfortable with great amenities and a friendly host. Getting to pet the dog was a huge plus! Very close to old town Fort Collins which had a ton to do and see. Overall a great stay!
this cute little spit was perfect for a couple night's stay as we explored the area and did some mountain biking. it had everything we needed, plus pups to pet and say hello to!
A lovely space! We absolutely loved the location, and it was a great way to stay in Fort Collins! We will definitely be staying there again!

This place was amazing! I felt so lucky to stay there. It was so peaceful and homey. It is close to the college and around the town. I walked to coffee shops, nearby gardens, and town shops comfortably. Thank you so much it was a privilege!

The room was nice and quiet. The kitchen has a small oven and a fridge, making it convenient for storing and reheating any leftovers :) Jody provides very clear instructions on check in and out. She responds to messages quickly.
Jodi’s place was AMAZING! It was the perfect little retreat! Location was private and very inviting! Couldn’t have asked for a better stay! Highly recommend!
Super cute little place! Well appointed and cozy. Good location, close to restaurants on College Ave.

The Treehouse is just great! And Jodi is a kind and helpful host. She takes care of her guests well-being. The accommodation is cozy and has everything you need. The location is great, Old town can be reached quickly. I had a great stay. Thank you, Jodi!
Apartment was clean and had everything we needed! Scenery was great from the patio...beautiful old trees.

We enjoyed our stay at The Treehouse and the location perfectly met our needs for this visit to Ft Collins. The place met our expectations and exactly matched the description. Jodi was responsive to our questions and provided clear instructions for check-in and check-out.

This is our second time staying here and we loved it again! The accommodations are perfect, everything you need and nothing you don't. Location is great and Grouse was an added bonus to make us feel welcome. :)
Great location and fun place to stay-treehouse 😍

Adorable home & quiet neighborhood close to CSU. The studio was super cute, updated & very clean. Host was responsive, friendly when we crossed paths and made sure my stay was perfect. Grass path through the yard & narrow staircase up to the Tree House was the only potential concern if you come with large luggage. Home had nice bedding, good towels, coffee & tea choices, beer in the ‘fridge, fans & extra blankets which all made the stay very comfortable. No question, I’d stay there again!!
Sleep amongst the pine trees with the sound of chickens cooing and spring flowers abound in the garden. It was a peaceful, private oasis.
Great place to stay for a quick visit to Fort Collins or CSU.

Jodi's place was absolutely perfect for a quick overnight stay in Ft. Collins. We loved the treehouse feel of the place, the sweet chickens wandering the yard, and the cozy yet minimalistic design of the apartment. It's even cuter than the photos! Jodi was friendly and helpful, and check-in/out was some of the easiest we've experienced on Airbnb. We'd love to stay again next time we're in the area.
Place was great.
The Treehouse was the perfect place to stay for a weekend in Fort Collins. Walkable or a bike ride to a lot of great local establishments.
A perfect space for my wife and I to stay in (just a few blocks from restaurants/bars. Thanks Jodi!
The Treehouse is such a cute and cozy space. My son and I really enjoyed our stay there, especially the friendly chickens.
Cute place for a quick trip. Had everything we needed. Very easy to find, in a quiet neighborhood. We would stay again and would recommend!
Jodi’s place was as comfortable and peaceful stays as we have had in a great location close to the commercial district. Grouse, her dog, is also such a sweet good boy 🐶. Would stay again.

Jodi has created a perfect getaway in what feels like a tree house in a historic area of Ft Collins. Perfectly situated between CSU and downtown. The bed was ver comfortable, the bathroom clean and front porch very inviting for a cup of tea to relax. It’s a great value for what you get. Jodi was responsive and very communicative and friendly.

What a sweet little spot and Jodi was so helpful! We had a surprise snow storm and she cleared a path to my rental vehicle AND cleaned my vehicle off! The apartment has a great vibe and is cozy and clean. It had everything to make my stay comfortable. The bed was super comfy too!
Thank you Jodi ❤️

10/10. Was in town for a show at Washington's downtown. A bit of a hike but definitely walkable (used to do it all the time when I lived down the block). The weather went bad one day and it was the perfect place to hole up and read a book for the afternoon.
Great guest house and location, and Grouse is a good boy!
One of the best stays I had in a great location, definitely want to come back and would definitely stay again
This was a very nice place to stay. Clean, comfortable, excellent location, and great communication from the host. I will definitely stay here again!
very cute space with a fun tree house experience. cute chickens and adorable neighborhood. very responsive
Great stay. Jodi was kind and flexible. The studio was just the right size for me and walkable to downtown and great restaurants.
Great place to stay while seeing music downtown! Will definitely book again.

I’m definitely going to stay here again!
Loved it! 😍
Jodi’s treehouse is a bright, loft-style space, with everything you need for a short stay in Fort Collins. Jodi was a great host and I appreciated the flexible check in time. I would stay here again!
Think was the 2nd time we stayed at the Treehouse and it was perfect for our short visit to Ft. Collins. Jodi gave us immediate help when I couldn't figure out something. The location is great.
Treehouse was comfortable, spotless, and within walking distance to CSU and the downtown area.

Perfect private space for me while I dropped off my son at CSU. Recently remodeled with a hip, posh look. I almost didn't leave because I was so cozy, warmly wrapped in the bed. Thanks for a cool spot to stay. There's no TV, so you'll need to go to a fun bar to watch the big game. :)
Great, peaceful place in Fort Collins. We loved the space and how close it was to downtown. Thanks!

Our stay at the Treehouse was just lovely. We were new to the city and felt very fortunate to have ended up on such a peaceful street that was minutes away from everything. The place itself was just what you want from a getaway: clean and cozy and lacking all the clutter of your own home! As an out-of-towner who's not used to cold weather, I found the heated floor in the bathroom to be a delicious amenity. Thanks for having us y'all!
Very cute and affordable stay. Close to Oldtown Foco and CSU. Will stay here again :)
Awesome hosts, the place was perfect. Clean, quiet, and comfortable.
The treehouse was cozy, clean, quaint, and easy to access. It was the perfect little place for our quick Fort Collins getaway after a lovely visit with family for Thanksgiving! Thank you, Jodi!
Jodi was so proactive about check in and made the process easy. The place was immaculate and adorable. I genuinely can't wait to go back.

Great place to stay in Old Town Ft Collins, quiet residential street. Treehouse is just as the name implies-up in the evergreen trees, with chickens, squirrels and dog Grouse below. We had some snow while I was there and the host kept the stairs free and clear of snow.
Great spot, had everything we needed. Very inviting, clean, and new. Location was very convenient, easy walk to Old town. Would definitely recommend and hope to stay again soon.
Amazing place! Will definitely stay here again when we get back to Ft Collins.
Absolutely wonderful experience. Highly recommend this location and host
Na

Great place to unwind and get away from the noise of the world. Very peaceful and calming vibe. Super communication with Jodi before, during, and after the stay, so I felt well taken care of! The heated bathroom floor is a dream. Thank you again so much. Absolutely recommend.

This was quite an enjoyably quiet and peaceful stay where I could relax on a long road trip. The treehouse is quaint and cute and I loved every second of my stay. It really opened my eyes to how beautiful the northern Colorado area is.
Unique, clean tree house near Old Town! Repeat guests, as we enjoy staying there!

A close walk to Colorado State Jodi and her family welcomed us with open arms. They were kind and they had 2 beautiful dogs. Grouse was very friendly. The apartment was clean with a range of tea and beer options. I definitely recommend staying here and I will back next time I’m in Fort Collins!
Lovely, calming place to stay. Some tree and cozy backyard therapy. ☺️
This spot is unique, lovely, and highly recommended. Quiet, conveniently located, and very comfortable. so clean. Perfect for 1-2 people.
A perfect place to stay when visiting CSU.

Very nice unit on a beautiful property. There is a nice sitting area on the patio. Fort Collins is a nice town and this was overall a good place to stay.
The only down sides were (1) some windows do not have curtains/blinds which limits privacy, and (2) one of their dogs was not okay with strangers. I had two tense interactions with said dog when they left it off leash in the yard. My review would be 5 stars if not for these two draw backs.

The space is perfect getaway close to town and yet seemingly far away in the privacy of Jodi’s backyard. You’ll have everything you need here.
We Loved meeting the family and their pups. It was such a cozy stay.
Very cute place and clean. Can occasionally hear the train horns blowing at night, but it’s not super loud. Would definitely stay here again if I’m in Fort Collins!
Great place to stay! Enjoyed our first tree house experience looking forward to staying here again! Very clean place and friendly hosts!
Extremely quiet. Close to campus and easy to get around town from their location (both walking and driving). Good set-up with good wifi.
Lovely space, great location to let you explore Fort Collins. Cozy stay for two. Definitely matches the treehouse vibe
Wonderful treehouse studio! This worked out perfectly for our trip and Jodi was very communicative which helped us keep everything moving.

Charming place . Located upstairs w 2 trees surrounding the deck . The deck has 2 chairs . Home away from home w a beautiful setting . Located behind their house w a gate and walk through back yard w beautiful greenery . The room is immaculately clean w everything one could need . Bonus coffee for am . Loved the place .
We absolutely loved our stay! We biked 10-15 min into town each day. Lovely backyard. Simple and comfortable place to stay, very cozy. Would definitely come again!

Can't say enough good things about this place. Perfect location for anyone looking for a quiet and cozy spot in a great neighborhood, right next to downtown and everything that Fort Collins has to offer. Everything about my stay was top notch. I travel to Fort Collins regularly and, if it's available, this will be my new go-to spot when in the area.
Sweet little place, spotless and conveniently located. We will stay again.
I love their dogs!
Nice and secluded. The AC was a bonus in the heat! It’s an active neighborhood so be prepared if you’re ultra sensitive to noise, but still an amazing little spot close to downtown.
perfect location, nice yard, great hosts.
Great location
Excellent place. Great setup and great neighborhood. I will always try to stay here when I am in town!

Great stay in FoCo! We were able to walk to CSU easily, plus restaurants and coffee shops nearby. The neighborhood is adorable. Grouse the pup was in the front yard to meet us and always made sure to say hello anytime we were walking through the yard to the Airbnb. Such a cutie. It was in the high 80s F outside but we didn't even need to use the AC, the fans and the shade from the trees kept us comfortable. The place has everything you could need for a short stay. Bed was comfortable. It should be clear from the listing but you are staying on someone's property so you may see the family. Wasn't a problem for us but something to consider if you want full privacy. Good value and we would stay again.
Jodi's treehouse is really cute, felt like a home immediately. Everything you need is there and it was super clean. Communication was great.

Great place! Really comfortable and cute! Loved the dogs and chickens greeting me too😊
Location was perfect for getting to CSU
The treehouse is a quiet, comfortable, and clean spot to stay if visiting FC. Jodi was welcoming and helpful. Would definitely return!
This was a really cool space! And I loved the greeting from the dog. Thank you
Simply put... great place for 2 people. There is ample room and amenities to make any stay wonderful.

The Treehouse was a great stay and would absolutely stay again. Great location close to all the restaurants and shops in Fort Collins but located behind a charming little home on a beautiful tree lined street. Easy access and good communication with the owner, great shower, all you'll need for a BnB.
Beautiful, clean space. Super easy check in, and great communication throughout by the host.

We loved our experience at Jodi's Treehouse! Clean, cozy and everything we needed for our first trip to Fort Collins. We were greeted by such a sweet pupper(Grouse) and beautiful chickens! The Treehouse was adorable and such attention to detail! Jodi couldn't have been sweeter, we really enjoyed our conversation and we're happy we got to meet on our last night.
A short and lovely walk brings you right into Old Town which has great bars and restaurants(Social was our favorite). We spent our days hiking and nights enjoying the charm FoCo has to offer. We would love to come back to the Treehouse!

We really enjoyed our quick stay in this clean, comfortable space. There was plenty of room for the two of us. The neighborhood is lovely, very walkable and peaceful. It was about a mile walk to where we had dinner and drinks (The Mayor of Old Town—highly recommended, delicious food & 100 brews on tap); there are tons of other walkable options as well. Their dog is so cute & sweet—we loved when he visited us on the deck for some pets—and the chickens made me smile. The hosts are both thoughtful and respectful of privacy. The “tree house” is in their backyard, and we did glimpse family members outside a couple times, but it still felt kind of separate and private. We would certainly stay again.
Great location, great little place.. very nice hosts and very accommodating.. we will be back!
Wonderful Airbnb. Just what we needed for our trip back in Fort Collins. Jodi has a lovely property that’s so quiet and relaxing. An oasis in the city.

Super cute, clean, and located on a tree lined street just a few blocks from CSU campus, the Treehouse was perfect for our needs. After a long travel day, the welcome beverages were a bonus surprise that we very much appreciated and enjoyed. The communication is clear. The pups are friendly. The chickens are cute.
Super cute place that we loved. Yard is pretty, good location, safe. Cute room.
Great location, clean, and unique. We loved the space, and being greeted by chickens. Totally recommend without reservation!
Jodi’s home is great. It is in a perfect neighborhood with easy access to CSU and Old Town. I wish I realized how nice of a place it was because I would have stayed longer
Great stay! Quiet neighborhood, so close to CSU. Wonderful studio on the second floor surrounded by pine trees.
Great stay! Jodi did a great job of communicating prior to the stay and the apartment was perfect for a short stay in Fort Collins.
Incredibly convenient and clean as can be. Perfect home base for a Fort Collins visit
The treehouse was clean, comfortable and private. Jodi, Bill and Otis were warm hosts and we enjoyed their pets, too!
The Tree House is the coolest and the hosts are wonderful. We hope everyone that stays here continues to treat it with the utmost respect, it’s a real treasure.
Great place to stay near the CSU campus - close, but away just enough to be a retreat at the end of the day. Nice neighborhood, clean and welcoming space. Jodi was easy to communicate with.
This Treehouse is such a great/cool place to stay! Highly recommend it!
Great location and very neat little room! Highly recommend!!
Great place! Super nice & helpful host.

The treehouse is just fabulous!! The pictures don’t do it justice with just how cute and comfortable it is! Jodi has decorated it so well and it had everything we needed! Great shower, even a toaster oven so we could heat up our local leftovers. Waking up with the trees in view was so nice. It’s in a great location close to Old Town! It was the perfect stay for our anniversary trip and Jodi was a great communicator!

We loved staying in the Treehouse! Highly recommend. The accommodations and hosts were excellent and it was a great landing spot for us to enjoy Fort Collins for the night. Close walking access to College (and a nice long walk to Old Town through the beautiful and lush neighborhood). Great spot.
What a peaceful and beautiful place!! I can’t celebrate it enough, I’d live here if I could

A great place to stay while we visited our son. I could not find a hair dryer but did not look to hard. The space was beautiful and clean and the bed was very comfortable. Thanks so much for sharing your treehouse!!

Great location in a quiet neighborhood and so close to the university. If the weather had been nicer, it would have been easily walkable to Old Town as well. Great new shower and appreciated the coffee and extra beverages.
Great stay. Cool spot. Friendly host really comfortable and fun place to be at Montana.
Amazing place to stay!
It was clean and close to downtown!
Jodi’s treehouse was great! Just what we were looking for as it’s located close to CSU and Old Town. Clean and comfortable.
This was a perfect place to stay for a busy weekend on campus. We could walk but also have the quiet rest we needed.
We loved Jodi’s place, it is perfect for exploring the area and a great location. Felt very private even though it was in the backyard, due to the huge pines!
Wonderful place. The yard is beautiful. Side gate entrance makes it easy to come and go. Very clean and tidy. Very nice bathroom. Super close to all the fun downtown things to do in Ft. Collins.

This is a lovely, well thought out unit in a very nice neighborhood close to CSU. Jodi and her husband are friendly and helpful. It does have stairs but the advantage is you wake up with trees off the deck. We would definitely stay here again and recommend this to friends and family 👍❤️
Great location. Cute doggos and chickens. Easy access. Felt like home. Super nice family.
Cute,clean, great location up in the trees!
The Treehouse is in a good location, very clean, comfortable and quiet. This is the second time I went back and I will go back again.
Great stay! Easy check in, clean, and quiet.

My daughter and I truly enjoyed Jodi's Tree house accommodations. The bedding and mattress were superb and the entire place was super clean. We had a quiet stay and were able to hang out with the backyard chickens! The location was very convenient to the college and the old town area. I would definitely stay here again.
Absolutely perfect location, <5 mins to CSU campus, <10 min drive to downtown. Super cozy little house, very clean, and super helpful host!
awesome spot! great neighborhood, amazing hosts, clean space, easy checkin... Can't wait to visit again. definitely recommend if you're staying in Fort Collins. Jodi was so accommodating and helpful.

Perfect stay. Peaceful, quiet, and comfortable. So good it was hard to leave. Sweet dogs and chickens in the yard. Jodi was quick and responsive to my questions. If you're looking for a place close to campus and old town this place is perfect.
Wonderful location, super comfy, cofee and coffee makers were a plus for an early departure! Jodi is so friendly and helpful. Her spot is so sweet and I'll def be staying again!
A fun little space. Jodi is very responsive and has a very cute and friendly dog.
really cool private space separate from the main house. Grouse is a really friendly dog to say hi to...the space was just what I needed

The Treehouse was a great little place, perfect for our needs. It was neat and clean, It was close to the center of town, and parking was easy. We loved the chickens in the yard, and the dogs were friendly. There was limited contact with the host family - most was done by email - but any contact we had was very friendly and polite. When we return to Ft. Collins, we'll definitely stay here again.
This is a quiet, cozy, private space. It worked well for me for a 5-night stay.

Jodi's Treehouse was a beautiful space in a central part of town, very quick access to everything we wanted to see in town. Incredibly comfortable accomodations and Jodi went above and beyond! Also a variety of friendly animals on the property that were a very pleasant surprise.

The tree house is a lovely space, and very conveniently located for old town and the university area. The hosts were great communicators and accommodating to my needs. I would definitely stay there again!

I stayed here for about a week and loved it! The host was super helpful and responsive to anything I needed but otherwise it was a totally isolated stay considering it’s on the same property! The location is convenient and the studio is stocked with everything you may need. I loved the animals they had around! I hope to stay again on my next visit to FC

Richard’s place was great! It was the perfect size for a weekend getaway, & everything was so well maintained & conveniently located. I passed it a couple times the first time I got there, but that was my own fault! Once I found it, it was very easy to find again & perfectly matched his description of where it would be. I would definitely stay there again.
I stayed 4 nights and it was easy to find, the space was great and very clean. Richard was right there when I pulled in and offered help if I needed it. Very friendly and responsive.
EVERYTHING was just what we needed. Refrigerator could be a little bigger though.

stayed here for 6 days and it was lovely! beautiful space, a peaceful patio and fenced in area for my pup to run around. Richard was really responsive and helpful and I appreciated being welcomed into the space! he even gave us extra towels for my dog when it rained which was so kind.
Awesome host. Everything was perfect start to finish.

my husband and I had a great staycation here while our house was having it's open house weekend. it was such a cozy little place with everything we needed. the weather was bad so the biggest thing we were bummed about was not getting to enjoy the view.

Probably the nicest airbnb experience I’ve ever had. I sincerely wish to visit again because it was so peaceful, and the host was so welcoming. The space itself was spotless, and it was very easy to relax. The entire property is lovely, with happy ducks, chickens, and pigs all with the backdrop of a huge mountain.
Loved this place!! Was within easy access to Fort Collins, or if you are traveling to Cheyenne, WY. Close to restaurants, hikes, and brews. Richard had a lot of great recommendations!!
Had a lovely stay. Richard, the animals and the space are all great. Looking forward to staying here again! Must check with Richard ahead of time about the hot tub so he has time to prepare it.

We visited our friends who live in Fort Collins in March and needed a dog-friendly place to stay. This is such a cozy and cute Airbnb. I love how quiet it is and the kitchen has all the basics you need. You have the beautiful view of the snow covered mountains in the morning while having coffee. I enjoyed seeing the pigs, ducks and chickens in the morning. There's a fenced-in yard where our dogs can do their business (and yes we picked up after them before we left).
It's located off the highway, but it's quiet at night. There's only 2 of us so the queen sized bed is fine though a bit tight (we're just not used to it) . One improvement would be a small closet or some drawers to put your clothes or stuff.
Overall, it was a great deal and surprisingly a short drive to downtown and close to our friends' house. The host was very responsive and always ready to take action if there are issues. Thank you for a great stay!
This place was awesome! Beautiful cozy space with amazing house plants and views. We thoroughly enjoyed saying hi to the pigs, ducks, and chickens!
He was a very fun and interesting host! Would definitely stay here again!

What an amazing spot! We had a beautiful view of the mountains and our dog loved watching the pigs and chickens peck in the yard. Easy to find, sparkling clean with lots aof beautiful plants and great natural light, and had a great 2 nights of sleep. Lory State park nearby and easy access to old town Fort Collins. a perfect weekend getaway!
Absolute adored the atmosphere… the ducks, chicken, geese and chickens provided a delightful experience. Great little place.
Really nice little spot tucked away with covered deck and yard. Rich was extremely responsive and friendly. Loved seeing all the other animals on the property. Wish we could have stayed longer.

My boyfriend and I stayed at this Airbnb for 2 nights and it was absolutely amazing. Richard was extremely helpful, super nice. Hot tub was amazing the only issue was it was kind of confusing to find but I do have to say he gave extremely clear instructions (it was a long trip). Other than that, it was easy to get there after we knew where to park. There was little to no traffic where the Airbnb was. It was quiet, beautiful and we honestly were writing notes for how we want our house in the future. After we used the hot tub I forgot to close the front door and complained about how cold it was until I found out It was actually my fault. It was still one of the best night sleeps I’ve ever had. The bed is so comfortable by the way. I definitely will come back if I ever need to.

This space is very lovely. It’s the perfect size for a weekend stay. It is clean, bright, and cozy. Richard is a great host as well. He is very friendly, responsive, and accommodating. We had a wonderful weekend here and will be keeping this place in mind for the future!

Loved Richard’s place! Awesome private view from the kitchen and loved seeing the animals as we came and went. Bed’s super comfy and the bathroom is spacious. Do yourself a favor and have some fresh eggs for breakfast!
Richard has done a great job setting this place up. I really felt comfortable. I really loved all the plants. As well as waking up to the ducks, chickens and pigs .I definitely recommend it.
Richard was accommodating and extremely kind! Beautiful spot inside and out. Great location close to all of the things Fort Collins has to offer!

My partner and I had such a wonderful stay here! The house is adorable with a beautiful view of the mountains out back - the photos do not do it justice!! We had everything we needed for a comfortable stay and the place was spotless upon arrival. Richard was beyond helpful and responsive. We will absolutely stay here again if we return to the area.
The cottage is small but quiet and well designed. Everything I needed for a quick trip with my pup. Richard is a great host and the growing collection of farm animals was a real treat.
Great host, great location. Peaceful
Anybody passing through the Fort looking for a welcoming host should check out this place! Beautiful property, friendly and timely communication with host.
Richard was an amazing host during our trip . Very accommodating and helpful . The home was a fantastic stay.

Richard’s place was perfect for a retreat into nature! The place was so warm and cozy, even during the first cold days in Colorado. There is so much attention to detail in the amenities and decor - everything you could possibly need and it’s so cute! We loved the hot tub after chilly days outside.

What a sweet guest house! Beautiful sunrises and sunsets. I got to watch the ducks and chickens and the pig while sipping morning tea - very entertaining! The house was clean and cozy with gorgeous house plants. The house had everything I needed for a 2 day getaway.
Very comfortable stay! The place is very unique and artistic with its decor.
Richard has used the space he has extremely well, including but not limited to this adorable and comfortable guest house.
Cool and welcoming environment. Will be staying again!

Richard's place was peaceful and quiet in the back of his wonderful property into which he has put so much effort! His creativity and skills and artistic sense all shine through. The kitchen and living area are cozy and functional and the bathroom and bedroom are downright roomy! we enjoyed talking to him about his projects and appreciated his flexibility with our check-in. Highly recommend!

This was a lucky find. Cozy place close to where we spent our days. Great spot for our dog. The place had everything we needed to sleep comfortably and enjoy coffee. Parking was on site and had a cute little farm. Richard was a great attentive host. We would visit again.
Cutest place ever, and Richard is a great great host! 👌
Cute rustic place that felt very private, friendly host and a beautiful Mountain View. Close enough to drive quickly mountains and downtown.

This standalone guesthouse at the back of Richard's property is a true delight. You pass his home, garden, hot tub, and chicken run (with ducks and a friendly pig!) before arriving at your private stay with a porch and beautiful mountain view. The inside is comfortably decorated and comes with everything you need to enjoy time alone or with a loved one. We'll be returning for sure! Richard is a fantastic and responsive host, and we couldn't ask for a better time away.
Unique and lovely space!

Super cute place with lots of character and everything we needed. The pig and ducks and chickens was super fun too! When walking through the main house yard to the guest house where we stayed was absolutely beautiful too, a little pond, lights around and the landscaping was so well kept too! Wish we could have enjoyed it more but we had a special event to attend to. Thank you Richard for having us!
I love his place and his animals, very nice and responsive!

Relaxing, beautiful view, close to trails! Richard was very responsive. Place was just as pictured and the hot tub was an added bonus. Close to the area trails and downtown. I would stay here again, but for longer!
Comfortable, private, and the sunrises were amazing. Truly loved this place, and Richard was a great, responsive host. Thanks for the eggs and coffee for breakfast, Richard!

We had such a great time here! The space is adorable and was perfect for myself, husband, our dog, and toddler for a week. Our highlight of everyday was going to say hi to the animals. We will definitely be back in the future!

My husband and I, with our 2 dogs, stayed here for a week in October, and it was perfect for us. This little house is so cozy, and the view is amazing. Richard is a wonderful host ready to answer any questions . I definitely recommend this spot for your next getaway.

Unexpected, Hidden Gem. Felt like our little hide away.
Had a wonderfully experience.
Host "Richard" friendly, responsive and great to chat with.

This was my first Air B&B reservation, and it did not disappoint! Richard was very friendly, and showed us around the property right when we arrived. If you’re an animal lover this is the perfect place to stay. I couldn’t get enough of his backyard animals. Dogs, chickens, ducks, and my personal favorite Nugget, a cute little pig. The view was spectacular. I enjoyed waking up in the morning to the golden sun, mountains, birds, and squirrels. We chose to eat breakfast out on the deck each morning. There’s a nice swing to relax on, and you get to hear the animals go about their business each morning. The guest house is very quiet, and a little chilly at night, but I personally prefer that while sleeping. There’s a fire place next to the bed if you wanted it warmer, or you could leave the windows closed at night. I loved the guest house, and the backyard. Richard was on the property during our stay, but he felt like a friend. It wasn’t uncomfortable. I loved this Air B&B, and Nugget! 🐷
Second time staying with Richard & it was just as great as the first!

Richard was super responsive and helpful. He had a few recommendations that ended up being perfect for us. The home was clean and quaint with everything we could have needed during our stay. We'd gladly stay at Richard's place again. Thanks for hosting us!
This was an awesome place to stay. I would do it again in a heartbeat!!!

The property was very pleasant and well-maintained. We didn't have any problems, and really enjoyed our stay. The fresh eggs and available garden was delightful, and overall the place was very homey. I would highly recommend it.

This place is idyllic!!! Originally I was only going to stay 2 nights....but after being there, I did not want to leave and added 2 more nights....every morning i went to a different place close by for a beautiful hike and then the rest of the day I spent at this airbnb, working remotely. The view was beautiful and peaceful. I really enjoyed the porch swing in the evenings as well.
And Richard was a good host, making sure i had everything i needed and wanted, even shared his farm fresh eggs with me.
If I'm ever in Fort Collins again, i know where I'll be staying!
Place was perfect, fantastic host
Richard was ver responsive to helping us getting checked in and settled. Quaint comfortable place close to town and great view.
Like a slice of heaven. I hope this space is available the next time I come visit the area. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Definitely one of the best Airbnb we’ve stayed in. It was such a cute and quaint place to stay. Plenty of space to let the dog out to roam and play on private space. Would definitely definitely recommend staying here.
Enjoyed our stay so much! Thank you Richard!

WOW! This place is magic. It’s a peaceful retreat, close to everything Fort Collins has to offer. The guest house is immaculately clean and comfortable, with an amazing view to wake up to. We enjoyed doing yoga and drinking coffee on the porch in the morning, looking at the mountains. Richard and his pets make this place extra special. Do not hesitate to stay here! ❤️
I had a great time staying here. The inside was clean and had good vibes all around. Loved the fenced in yard for my dogs and also the pig - she is sooooo cute.

Richard was super responsive and proactive in communication about our stay! We loved saying good morning to his pig, ducks, and chickens! I would recommend staying here if you are in Fort Collins. It is close to downtown but still a nice little retreat.

I lived in Fort Collins, CO for 26 years until moving away in 2020. This was my first visit to my other “home” and I brought my dog along. The two of us could not have had a better stay than we did at Richard’s incredible property! It is absolutely perfect. The carriage house is quaint, quiet, ideal for a dog to accompany you, and it’s SPOTLESS. The bed is really comfortable and everything works perfectly in the house. Richard is ultra-responsive and friendly, plus it’s an added bonus that he has an urban farm with animals! I loved seeing the chickens, ducks, and pig each morning in their area.
This is the best home rental I’ve stayed in and it made my trip absolutely perfect. I will definitely stay here again and recommend it highly!
Adorable stay with comfortable bed! Loved the swing and farm animals out and about. Great views! Would come back again for sure.

This is how airbnbs SHOULD be!!! A local who uses some extra space on his own property. Richard’s place was so cute & we loved interacting with his animals. He even gave us some free goose eggs & they were delicious! I hope we get the chance to stay again.
Their space was just a little piece of Heaven on earth. They were just the most kind and accommodating~ if we ever need to pass thru again we’ll be there!!!
Richard’s place is like a little bit of home! The animals, garden, views, and adorable tiny home were all perfect. 10/10 recommend a stay with Richard!!

My wife and I stayed at Richard’s place with our dog and it was perfect for us. Richard is super friendly, responsive and helpful. The property is awesome, we loved the animals, sunflowers and other plants. The separate fenced in section of the yard by the guest house was great for letting our dog out. The guest house itself was minimal, very clean and had everything we needed. We really loved the light from the windows in the kitchen and the porch swing. My wife and I were both working remotely from the guest house and had no issues with the internet speed. Location is not far from downtown and very close to the Poudre trail, which is really nice. I would definitely recommend staying at Richard’s place!

This was a wonderful, beautiful and peaceful place to stay. It was so nice to see the animals and garden area too. Reminded me of home. I loved the way they had it set up. The careful attention to details and notes made it very easy to feel comfortable.
We had a beautiful time . The place was clean and our host was friendly. The ducks and the pig were so cute. The hot tub was very clean and relaxing. I would recommend this spot to anyone.

Had a great stay at Richards with my pups! Having the private fenced in area for them was perfect. Made mornings sitting on the swing perfect. Richard was very responsive with any questions I had. The place is just as pictured and has everything you would need! Everything was clean and bed was super comfy! Location is great; far enough away to have some peace and quite, but short drive to all the restaurants, coffee, shops, etc. I appreciated the lights around the pole out front to help find It more easily at night! :)

Walking through the abundant garden to the little guest house was lovely. We enjoyed watching the farm critters from the private porch with a view of the mountains. The guest house is sturdy, homey, quiet, well equipped and comfortable.
Richard was super friendly, available and went out of his way to repair some minor damage we did to our vehicle.

A beautiful, tranquil stay. Richard was a delight, as were his animals! The place felt isolated in the best way, and our stay was really peaceful. A short drive to lots of places - dog park, walking trail, grocery stores, restaurants, ice cream! Water pressure and temperature was great! Bed was comfortable. Everything we needed for a great stay.

Beautiful property with stunning views from a super cute carriage house. On the main road but feels like a little oasis. Private fenced in yard for the dogs adjacent to chickens and ducks. Richard was super helpful and went above and beyond to ensure we were accommodated. Would recommend to anyone wanting to visit Fort Collins or catching a show at the Mishawaka.

Richard’s home is one of those places that you experience for the first time and think “I love Airbnb”. It’s incredibly unique, thoughtfully crafted, and perfectly situated with a Mountain View. Richard is also a very responsive and flexible host, and an overall quality human being. I would absolutely stay here again.
Richard was very friendly and answered all our questions. He gave us great advice for places to eat! Wish we could have stayed longer!

Very cozy spot with a responsive and friendly host with easy access to lots of things to do in FoCo/LaPorte. Would stay here again. Animals, nice views, quaint interior, and a hot tub in a lovely setting.
We had a great time staying here! Richard was an awesome host and the place was beautiful!

This was my third time staying at this AirBnB and for good reason. It's exceptionally clean, very comfortable, and centrally located. The hot tub is a huge bonus and the hosts are always very welcoming and making cool improvements to the outdoor spaces.

Richard was a fantastic host. The Airbnb is in a great location with super fast access to downtown Fort Collins. Would highly recommend this place to anyone.
The bed is really comfortable (better than my bed at home) and the shower is great (great pressure, lots of hot water!).
The airbnb feels personal and well thought out, and it is clear the space has been curated carefully to make guests stay as comfortable as possible.
We really enjoyed the personal touches and highly recommend the hot tub in Richards beautiful garden (great for star gazing!).
Although we didn't get a chance to use it - it was really nice of Richard to leave firewood for the outdoor fire-pit next to the decking - had we been staying longer we'd have loved to use this and the outdoor grill.
Richard's communication was fantastic throughout always responding quickly and happy to help with any queries.
Thanks again Richard!

We enjoyed our stay at Richard's place! It was the perfect quiet retreat. Unfortunately, there was a big storm the night we arrived, but Richard was great about meeting us outside to walk us back through the yard since there was a lot of debris from the storm.
This place was absolutely perfect for a getaway. Even though it was on the host’s property, it still felt very private. Very rustic and calming!
Richards place is very comfortable, clean, and had everything we needed.
Best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. Richard is great. Please is super unique and close to all the good spots in old town. Hot tub is awesome.

Cozy,cute, cottage! In my mind one of the better VRBO’s that I’ve stayed at If you like hanging out in the gardenwith very calm ducks and chickens this is your place. Set a few miles off from town, with excellent views of the mountains. Nice functional kitchen. True confession, I’m not really a dog lover. This place would be super perfect if you were bringing dogs with you. But just great if you’re two people that are doggone tired and wanting a quiet place to hang out.
Great stay, perfect place near the poudre canyon!

Richard's place was homey, clean and a great respite from the bustle of Ft. Collins. Beautiful views of the mountains and we were able to have cozy fire pit at night.
Per Richard's recommendation we had a an awesome breakfast at MeOhMy restaurant just minutes from his place.
Thanks Richard for a great stay!
Richard’s place is so amazing! The views are phenomenal, the space is so nice and Richard is great!
Host was very responsive and polite
Richard was very friendly. I loved the duck eggs in the morning. Nice place. I’d stay there again.
Perfect location for CSU graduation. Unique cool space! Richard was very responsive.

Out of 5 stars we give Richard's place a 10. It was so cute and clean and cozy. The location is great, close to Old Town. There's a grocery store nearby but you feel like you're out of town.
The view from the house is great, and there's a cute little outside area that's fenced. We enjoyed the animals on property, and all the plants are gorgeous.
Richard was friendly and very responsive to messages. I definitely will book this rental if I ever get the chance again!

What an unexpected home, away from home experience - and Richard is a charming and gentle host, offering the perfect balance of welcome and privacy. We look forward to visiting again when the grounds are in full bloom - the thought of a wall of hops and a path flanked with sunflowers peaks my imagination and curiosity. Funky, immaculately appointed, thoughtfully clean - accessible to anything you want to do.
We had an awesome stay at Richard’s! Clean, inviting, cozy, and friendly! Must book if you have the chance!!! Thanks so much Richard!

Richard’s place was perfect for my daughter and me on our long weekend getaway with access to great hiking and restaurants. Richard is friendly, helpful and not intrusive. We enjoyed watching the ducks, chickens, and rabbits and especially appreciated fresh eggs! The hot tub was an awesome addition after a day of hiking. I would definitely return to this little gem!
Richard was a great host and the accommodations were amazing. Rustic yet modern with scenic views and close to downtown FoCo for dinner and a show! Would definitely stay here again!
Richard’s property is beautiful and so peaceful. He is a very kind and accommodating host. Highly recommend!
Really cool place. Would definitely recommend
This is a very peaceful, relaxing place. Everything in the cottage was pretty, artsy, with a beautiful kitchen window view. Great shower, nice cozy bed. We really loved this place.

Easily one of our favorite AirBnB we had ever stayed. Richard was an awesome host. He’s very responsive to our questions and messages. The guest house is super cozy and that view is absolutely amazing, it was very relaxing. The hot tub was very clean and very accessible. We had to leave our stay early due to family emergency, Richard was so accommodating and helpful with the process. He certainly helped making a difficult situation at home easier by being so understanding and accommodating. He even gave us some chicken and duck eggs to go. We will definitely return to Fort Collins to complete our trip in the near future, and will most definitely return to stay with Richard. His place is so great, don’t think we will ever stay anywhere else in Fort Collins!

This property was great. It’s very clean and beautifully decorated. We loved waking up in the morning to view the mountains, the ducks and chickens were a bonus. Richard even gave us some eggs. He communicated with us well, and also gave us privacy. The hot tub is worth paying a little extra for.
It was close to town. I also loved all the plants in the cabin. The bed was cozy and the fireplace next to it made it difficult to get out of bed! Would definitely stay here again!!!

We had the best time being able to just check out of reality for the weekend and just enjoy our first wedding anniversary. The hot tub was amazing and private with views for days. We cannot wait to get back up there again very soon.

What a wonderful place to stay!! Richard was and is a very generous host. His response was immediate to each message we sent him even when we asked to see, pet, and love on his fur children! The mountain view from the kitchen is impeccable and breath-taking; definitely a place to stay for those who don’t see mountains often (like us!).
Richard offered us duck eggs to make for breakfast one morning which were delicious! He gave us our space, as expected, but checked in with us periodically after making a personal connection with him the first day there…..coming from Iowa, we greatly appreciate hosts/hostesses who reciprocate the friendliness and personal connections!
The pictures online showcasing the place matched perfectly to where we stayed. Everything was clean and tidy and all instructions were thorough and understandable. I would recommend this stay to anyone and everyone tenfold. We will be here again in the future!
Love from Iowa.

Richard’s home on the range was absolutely wonderful! The carriage house is beautiful, filled with live plants, comfortable bedding and a beautiful view of the mountains. The fenced in yard was perfect for our pups! It’s a perfect little getaway to feel like you are out of the city and you are just a quick drive to town. We really enjoyed his animals and he shared his delicious duck and chicken eggs for us to eat for breakfast.
Had a lovely stay, cozy spot I would highly recommend!
Richard was very accommodating and communicative. The place was beautiful and fresh duck eggs were a lovely surprise!

We had a great stay at Richard’s place. The location was close to everything we wanted to do and the space itself was clean and cozy. The yard area was unique and we loved the farm animals - thanks for the duck and chicken eggs! We will definitely stay here again when we’re in the area next.

I can’t say enough good things about this listing and the host, Richard! The guesthouse is so cozy and only five minutes from Old Town! Richard was very accommodating when I needed to add an additional pet to the booking and was super friendly during our stay! I would highly recommend this stay to anybody going to Fort Collins. My wife and I had a very relaxing experience!
We really enjoyed our stay at Richard's place! It felt like we were out in the country and the home is adorable. Will definitely stay again!

Quite the little getaway. We (especially the pup) had a wonderful time staying at Richard's guest house. Richard was very hospitable and accommodating. We look forward to staying here again while in Fort Collins.

Such a wonderful place! My partner and I wanted to plan a quick weekend trip and it was important that we were able to bring our dog, so finding this place was perfect! The property was lovely and all the accommodations were perfect for people and pets. We very much enjoyed our stay and would absolutely choose to stay here again 😁

Richard and his place were great. He was very welcoming and even gave us eggs from his ducks! The hot tub was very private and Richard gave us a very easy run down on how to use it. The location was also great, a quick five min drive from downtown foco! My only recommendation is that if you have dogs w a high prey drive to think before you book here. The small animals share a fence w the yard of the guest house which led to some chaos.
Richard’s place is one of the most beautiful and peaceful places that I’ve ever stayed. Will definitely stay here again and would recommend to friends and family.

Great place to stay!! We enjoyed mornings on the porch swing and the lively personalities of the ducks! It was also super clean and cozy! Richard was super helpful and responsive.
It’s only 8 minutes away from downtown. I thought it was a so kind for him to offer us duck and chicken eggs! Also he had lights on the pole outside, for super easy findable at night, really thoughtful!! Overall would most definitely stay again! :D
We had a lovely time at this tiny house! Clean and cozy and even a private yard for our dog. We were comfortable all around! We loved the ducks, chickens, and bunnies too! Thank you, Richard!
Easy check in. Great amentities. Richard was very responsive and very nice! Would totally stay here again!

A girlfriend and I decided to fly in for a long weekend last minute, and we absolutely lucked out with finding Richard’s place! The space is quaint, cozy, impeccably clean and honestly about the cutest space I have ever seen. Richard by far gave us the greatest Airbnb experience I have ever had- He was helpful, accommodating, communicative, thoughtful (even left us fresh eggs by the gate for breakfast). If we ever find ourselves back in the Fort Collins area, there’s not a second thought as to where I’ll be staying!

Dog Friendly with fenced yard! Richard is an amazing host and was so open to my last minute booking with MULTIPLE dogs that I was transporting from Cali to MN!! Due to weather/storms I didn’t get in until late. The instructions were easy to follow and path well lit. The decor was rustic and I appreciated the overall vibe/energy of the place. Richard was great about getting the 4-6 inches cleared from the path, the deck for the dogs and even cleared off my rental van, which of course didn’t come with a snow brush/scraper!!! A very helpful and gracious host! He has a separate area/yard for his dogs while his guests are there with theirs. Dog friendly hosts are few and far between!

I love Richard's little cottage. It was such a relaxing and wonderful stay for me and my dog. Of all the dog-friendly hotels and Airbnb's I've stayed at, this was the best! There were extra water bowls and treats and dog bags, and an entirely private fenced in yard. The expansive view of the mountains was also a pretty good perk!

Lovely little house! Beautiful view and the pet policy was amazing, 4 dogs were welcome!
Host made everything very easy and stress free.
Richard has an amazing property and i really loved the space. beautiful views, homey and cozy.. very comfortable and wouldn't mind visiting again.
The location was perfect! Super close to downtown but also a nice get away with a great view.
Great place and has a super friendly host! I will definitely book again if I'm in the area.
Great host, very attentive. Cleared the snow for us.
Serene, peaceful, felt so relaxed and welcome our entire stay!!
Oasis, Peaceful, Comfortable, Views. Covered outdoor space was inviting. Indoor Space was charming with a rustic farmhouse flair. Fort Collins was less than 5 minutes away.

Richard was a fantastic host, very helpful and quick with communication. The location is absolutely perfect, and the views are one in a million. What I was most impressed by was the cleanliness of the home. Richard goes above and beyond to ensure you have a confortable stay. If we are ever in Colorado again, we’re staying here. Highly recommend!!!!

Perfect spot near Old Town, but still felt far enough out like a cottage in the woods. A beautiful garden with sunflowers and twinkling lights at night. The place had everything you could need and more, including fresh eggs from the chickens. Cute bunnies, chickens, and ducks live in the garden! The decorations were adorable and the vibe was perfect! Richard was a great host as well.
Excellent place to stay, exactly as described. Off a major road so does make it hard to find initially but the spray painted numbers do help. Peaceful and great for our dog.
Absolutely wonderful spot. Traveled there with a dog and a baby, recommend spending a few nights to truly enjoy it!

Staying at Richard's guest house was the highlight of our trip! It was great to come back from a day of conferencing to relax and recharge in the beautiful little guest house. The space itself was warm and welcoming, with extraordinary views. It had everything we needed for our five day stay and Richard made us feel at home. While off the highway, we couldn't hear the traffic at all. Instead, we were surrounded by peaceful quiet broken up by the content noises from the chickens and ducks. A wonderful and restorative place to stay!
A little oasis off the highway. This is a unique stay with wonderful charm. We would stay here again!

Enjoyed our quick stay. Very relaxing space and love the urban farm environment. House is beautiful and comfortable.
Thank you for being such a great host.
A superb place to stay. The host was very helpful and responsive. a highlight was enjoying the evenings on the front porch swing, looking out to the front range. And the bed was super comfortable.

I can’t wait to come back and stay at Richard’s place again. He made the experience very welcoming. The space is so well planned and detailed and had everything you could want. I highly recommend this Airbnb, it has great access to Fort Collins and surrounding area.
Super cute an relaxing stay
This was the first AirBnB we have stayed at and it was amazing. Great host and great location so close to town. Would happily recommend this to anyone wanting to stay in the Fort Collins area!

The place was clean. The view was great. The hot tub was a wonderful addition. The cook wear was pretty nice. The cottage was air conditioned. Little personal touches made the place feel unique and homey. He had fresh eggs from his hens waiting for us! Richard's availability and communication was excellent, and the place being smack in the middle of his beautiful garden made it special. Worth the money.

One of our favorite Airbnb experiences yet! The inside is awesome, even better than the photos, and has everything you need for a laid back “farm-feel” stay. Our favorite place to hang out was the cozy outdoor space, and our dog loved getting to stare down the chickens and rabbits on the property from the fenced in yard! Richard was an excellent host: communicative, thoughtful, and personable! This is on our list of Airbnb’s we hope to return to in the future. Thanks, Richard!
Richard’s place was great for crashing after a show at the Mishawaka. Very rustic with great mountain views.

This place is an absolute gem!!! Richard has done a beautiful job creating a space that feels comfortable and welcome. There is an air conditioner as well as fans that make the space very livable. More than that, the location is more in the country providing a wonderful oasis from day to day busyness.
It was a lovely place to stay for a quick trip to Fort Collins! Close to down town and easy to access! Would definitely stay again!
We absolutely loved staying at this Airbnb. Looking forward to another stay in the future. Richard is a great host.

This place is exactly why I love Airbnbing. Richard was a great host and did a great job at making a really special little place for guests to stay! The carriage house had everything that we needed and is very close to town…there are also awesome recommendations for places to go and eat in Fort Collins. We lived meeting Richard and his “pack” and felt very at home!
Creative design, relaxing porch swing and the various pets on the property add up to a great visit. The owner is helpful.

Close enough to Fort Collins, but also far enough away where you can stay out of the college crowd, relax on the porch swing, and enjoy the views of Horsetooth. There is your own private fenced in yard, so not only I, but my dog was able to take advantage of the space.

Richard's place was super cute. Loved the hot tub! Would definitely return for another visit.

Damon & Kim’s home is beautiful, they were highly accommodating, and Fort Collins is a gorgeous little town to visit. Nothing but positive things to say. Thanks so much!

I was able to work remotely on the Wifi and Damon was extremely responsive and welcoming.
